#Text=At the Ibero-American summit in Santiago , Chile on November 10 , Chávez called the Spain 's former prime minister , José María Aznar , a  fascist " .

column1: #Text=Current Prime Minister of Spain José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero tried to reply , but Chávez , although his microphone was switched off , kept interrupting him .
#Text=The Spanish King first pointed a finger at Mr. Chávez , with the words " Y tu " ( and you ) .
#Text=Then , while Zapatero still tried to reply , he said “ ¿ Por qué no te callas ? ” while making a gesture with his hand .
#Text=Note that the King used the informal ' te callas ' instead of the formal and polite third-person form .
#Text=Zapatero finally replied that " ... in a forum where there are democratic governments ... one of the essential principles is respect .

column3:
_	_	_	_
22-2	2216-2217	'	_	_	_	_
